quest.name: A-Digging We Will Go
journal: Xamott has ore on his mind.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename. Though such a trial must be as a relaxing diversion compared to your usual endeavors, it was still an impressive display.

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: Did you know that Kholusia's rich in sulphur? Well, it is. We've been minin' the stuff since ancient times.

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: And every so often, the selfsame veins yield what's called earthseed, a rare ore steeped in magick.

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: Time was, we used to refine earthseed for this and that, but the technique's been lost. The stuff's still out there to be had, though, provided you know where to look. And no place is surer'n the Duergar's Tewel.

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: Problem is, the site's occupied by our age-old rivals─the Goggs. Greedy sods claim the place is theirs, and refuse to let any other bugger near!

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: Oh, there never was a more odious lot than them Goggs. I could go on forever about those hornless whoresons... But then we'd be here forever, and that won't get us nowhere.

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: What it boils down to is this: if you want the earthseed, you've got to deal with the Goggs. Reckon you're up to the challenge?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: We have dealt with far worse. I am sure we can find a way to obtain what we need.

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: That's the spirit! Now, to help you find your way, I'll have one of ours go with you.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: (-???-)I'll do it! I'll go with them!

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: You, Korutt!?

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: I couldn't help overhearing. I knew the eaters had flocked to Mt. Gulg, but I didn't know why. To think the last Lightwarden's hiding up there...

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: The fate of Kholusia─no, the world─hangs in the balance. If I can be of some help, then I want to do my part!

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: Your zeal is commendable, lad, but it isn't so simple...

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: This here's Korutt. Young as he is, he's one of the village's finest miners. The lad's got an uncanny sense of where to dig, and his aim with a pickaxe is as true as any dwarf's.

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: But put him in the thick of battle, and he couldn't hit the side of a mine cart if he was sitting in it.

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: If all he needed to do was dig, he'd be your dwarf, but he's liable to become a sin eater's breakfast before he can even manage a swing.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: It's true... I'm hopeless in a fight...

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: But I still want to try! Please! Please let me go with you!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I take care of you, you take care of the ore.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: As long as you're aware of the dangers.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you so much! I'll try my best not to be a burden!

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: If you want to take Korutt, far be it from me to stop you. Keep him safe, though, will you?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: We will most assuredly encounter sin eaters along the way.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Though, with you in our company, they will be more a spectacle than a concern.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: See to your preparations, my friend. We will depart as soon as you are ready.

dialogue.name: XAMOTT
dialogue.text: Seriously, though, take care of Korutt. Lad's weaker'n a pint of pisswater.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: The Duergar's Tewel lies in a cave to the east. I'm ready when you are!

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Uwaaah!

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: J-Just as we're about to get there!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: One last push, then. Shall we, Forename?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: 'Twas a near thing in the end, but what matters is that we pulled through. Well fought, my friend.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: We're alive! We're aliiive!

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Let's hurry inside before any more sin eaters come!

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: We'll keep to the road and head east. I'm in your hands!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: It seems we have a fair distance to cover. Be on your guard for sin eaters.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Speak of the devils... Forename, the one on the left is yours.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: See that Korutt comes to no harm.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Amazing! You two are really strong!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Ah heh... It may interest you to know that Forename is a great hero in the land whence shehe hails. Some would say the greatest.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Really? Oh, you must have some stories to tell, Forename!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: That shehe does. Tales to impress and inspire you in turn. By all means, have herhim regale you with a few once our work is done.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Heh heh, I can't wait!

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Aaah! More of them!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Stay behind us, Korutt.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: B-But they're behind us too!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Forename, focus on the enemy. I will protect our charge.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Phew... I don't know much about fighting, but you two make a great team!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Forename is a team unto herhimself. I merely follow herhis lead.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Well, it looks like you've been doing this for years to me!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: ...Is that so? I...I shall take that as a compliment.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Um...did I say the wrong thing?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Not at all. Your words are most heartening. Indeed, I feel like a young man again.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: You talk as if you're old! How long have you two known each other, anyway?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Well...

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Uwaaah! There's even more of them!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: This is too close to Amity for comfort. Let's finish them quickly and move on.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: H-Hurry, this way!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: How much farther to the cave?

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Not far. It's just past this rise.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Ah, I believe I see it.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: Uwaaah! Again!?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: It appears we are surrounded...

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Fortunately, I have a little trick for such occasions.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Forename, draw them in!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: 'Tis done. Let us press on.

dialogue.name: KORUTT
dialogue.text: R-Right!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: I will shield Korutt! Give the eaters everything you have!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: I will ward off the attack! Stand with Korutt, Forename!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Not good... Quickly, spread out!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: It appears the commotion drew this one out. Forename─time to bring all to bear!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Ungh... Not now...

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Your tale will not end here!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Concentrate on the ones coming for Korutt! I will see to the rest!
